text: ivarkal (uyirppikkappattu) ivarkalutaiya iraivanin mun niruttappatumpotu ivarkalai nir kanpirayin (atu camayam iraivan ketpan) itu unmaiyallava? Enru"am! Enkalutaiya rappin mitu anaiyaka (meytan)" enru ivarkal kuruvarkal; appotu, "ninkal nirakarittuk kontirunta karanattal vetanaiyai anupaviyunkal" enru allah kuruvan
